item.title: 401Ks and Roth IRAs are nuanced DCA investment strategies
item.description: A 401K plan and a Roth IRA is often a investment strategy that individuals can interact with as a means of securing one’s future post-Retirement.

item.title: DCAs work when asset prices increase over time
item.description: DCAs work when asset prices increase over time [[Dollar Cost Averaging]] does improve the ROI of the investment if the asset price of the security that is being DCA’ed is increasing over time.

item.title: Exponentiated Gradient Reweighting for Robust Training Under Label Noise and Beyond
item.description: Title: Exponentiated Gradient Reweighting for Robust Training Under Label Noise and Beyond Authors: Negin Majidi, Ehsan Amid, Hossein Talebi, Manfred K.

item.title: Five ideas to GTD
item.description: Five ideas to GTD Getting things done requires defining what “done” means and what “doing” looks like. Outcome. Defining what “done” means Action.

item.title: Showcase
item.description: Want to see what Quartz can do? Here are some cool community gardens :) Quartz Documentation (this site!) Jacky Zhao’s Garden AWAGMI Intern Notes Shihyu’s PKM Chloe’s Garden SlRvb’s Site Course notes for Information Technology Advanced Theory Brandon Boswell’s Garden Siyang’s Courtyard If you want to see your own on here, submit a Pull Request adding yourself to this file!
